chromaClientHost.title: ChromaDB host
chromaClientHost.description: Host argument for ChromaDB HTTP Client

chromaClientPort.title: ChromaDB port
chromaClientPort.description: Port argument for ChromaDB HTTP Client

chromaServerAuthCredentials.title: ChromaDB server auth Static API token credentials
chromaServerAuthCredentials.description: ChromaDB server Auth Static API token.

embeddings.title: Embeddings provider (as defined in the langchain API)
embeddings.description: Choose the embeddings provider to use for generating embeddings

embeddingsConfig.title: Embeddings provider configuration
embeddingsConfig.description: Specific configuration for the embeddings. For example, for OpenAI, you can the model name as ({"model": "text-embedding-ada-002"}), for HuggingFace ({"model_name": "sentence-transformers/paraphrase-MiniLM-L6-v2"})

embeddingsApiKey.title: Embeddings API KEY (whenever applicable, depends on provider)
embeddingsApiKey.description:
Value of the API KEY for the embeddings provider (if required).

 For example for OpenAI it is OPENAI_API_KEY, for Cohere it is COHERE_API_KEY)

fields.title: Fields
fields.description:
Specify Dataset fields for text extraction in this array, using dot notation. 

E.g., for a crawler's 'text' output field, simply add 'text' to the array.

metadataValues.title: Metadata values
metadataValues.description: Custom values saved to db for every Dataset item as metadata

performChunking.title: Perform chunking
performChunking.description: If set to true, the resulting text will be chunked according to the settings below

chunkSize.title: Chunk size
chunkSize.description: The maximum character length of each text chunk

chunkOverlap.title: Chunk overlap
chunkOverlap.description: The character overlap between text chunks that are next to each other

datasetId.title: Dataset ID
datasetId.description: Dataset ID (when running standalone without integration)
